mxfile.diagram: <mxGraphModel dx="1200" dy="800" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1"> <root> <mxCell id="0"/> <mxCell id="1" parent="0"/> <!-- Начало --> <mxCell id="start" value="Потребность в разработке/изменении ИС" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="40" y="200" width="180" height="60" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <!-- Несколько ролей --> <mxCell id="role1" value="Заказчик / Бизнес-аналитик" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;horizontal=1;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="0" y="0" width="1800" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="role2" value="Руководитель проекта" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;horizontal=1;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="0" y="120" width="1800" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="role3" value="Разработчик" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;horizontal=1;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="0" y="240" width="1800" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="role4" value="Тестировщик" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;horizontal=1;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="0" y="360" width="1800" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="role5" value="Специалист по ИБ" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;horizontal=1;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="0" y="480" width="1800" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <mxCell id="role6" value="DevOps / Системный администратор" style="swimlane;fontStyle=1;horizontal=1;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="0" y="600" width="1800" height="120" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> <!-- Завершение --> <mxCell id="end" value="Постоянный мониторинг ИС" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="1600" y="200" width="180" height="60" as="geometry"/> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel>
